# Copilot Instructions for Python GitHub Actions Demo

This workspace demonstrates a simple Python project with GitHub Actions CI/CD. Follow the checklist below to understand and track the setup process.

## Checklist
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md in .github directory
- [x] Scaffold Python project (main script, test file)
- [x] Add GitHub Actions workflow for CI/CD
- [x] Ensure README.md exists and is up to date
- [x] Compile and test project
- [x] Document launch/debug instructions

Update this file as you complete each step.
